attributes.action: pay teachers, nurses and police officers the same salary as MPs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that MPs have excused their disgraceful thieving by claiming they are paid a pittance and that "the rules allowed it", the PM should at the very least pay teachers, nurses and police officers the same salary as MPs. They should also be given all the same tax breaks. If MPs struggle to live on £64,000, how on earth are  people who do a job which is actually of benefit to society supposed to live on half (or less)of that amount? MPs should try a real job in the real world(complete with all the idiotic regulations and incompetent interference that MPs have imposed on everyone else)
